Math class

　Almost compatible with JavaScript Math.

Implemented methods:
abs (Get absolute value)
acos (arccosine)
asin (arcsine)
atan (arctangent)
atan2 (Two-variable arctangent)
ceil (Round up)
floor (Truncation)
exp (e raised to the nth power)
log (Natural log)
max (The greater of the two values)
min (The smaller of the two values)
random (A random number between 0 and 1)
pow (multiplier)
round (Round to integer)
sin (sine)
cos (cosine)
tan (tangent)
sqrt (square root)

Implemented properties:
E (e)
LN10 (log(10))
LN2 (log(2))
LOG10E (Logarithm of e with base 10)
LOG2E (Logarithm of e with base 2)
PI (π)
SQRT1_2 (sqrt(1/2))
SQRT2 (sqrt(2))
